definition: sound card
sound/voice/tone/noise/reputation/classifier for sounds
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Obviously, you need a microphone and a sound card.
sentences.chinese: 顯然還需要一個麥克風和一個聲卡。

sentences.english: Intergration to sound card etc is not required.
sentences.chinese: 集成到聲卡等是不需要的。

sentences.english: You also need a sound card.
If the FSB is too high profile , sound card, there may not be the voice.
sentences.chinese: 如果外頻調的太高，聲卡就有可能不發聲了。

sentences.english: Compatible modem, ethernet card, sound card or other PCI card.
sentences.chinese: 兼容的調制解調器，以太網卡，聲卡或其他PCI卡。

sentences.english: Study the soundboard's application in the virtual instrument academic experiment.
sentences.chinese: 研究了聲卡在虛擬儀器教學實驗中的應用。

sentences.english: We keep finding problems when testing the boards.
sentences.chinese: 我們測試聲卡時一直髮現問題。

sentences.english: A virtual signal generator is developed based on the algorithm and sound card.
sentences.chinese: 利用該算法成功實現了基於聲卡的虛擬式信號發生器。
